name: Dori Heldreth
review: Wonderful Church full of wonderful Godly people! After visiting several PCA Churches, CCC Columbia was the best fit with its gospel-centered services and heart!! I would recommend to families, singles, the elderly as well as the young, this church has a little bit of all areas of life!

name: Frank Ward
review: Excellent church with a commitment to God's word and trying to honor God with our lives.

name: Holley Johnson
review: Wonderful scriptural preaching. Loved our visit when in Columbia.

name: Henry Bolin
review: Thankful to have a church family that is on mission in Columbia.
